sentences.sContent: Whether you are a carpenter or a therapist, a homemaker or a professor, it makes no difference.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether you are a carpenter or a therapist, a homemaker or a professor, it makes no difference.
sentences.sCn: 不论你是一个木匠或是一个治疗师，一个家庭主妇还是教授，这都没有区别。

sentences.sContent: My mother was a mother, homemaker.… I think my mother influenced me as far as my love for reading.
sentences.sContent_eng: My mother was a mother, homemaker.… I think my mother influenced me as far as my love for reading.
sentences.sCn: 我母亲就是一位母亲，家庭主妇……我想我母亲对我的影响很大，甚至包括我对阅读的喜爱。

sentences.sContent: “I would not have wanted to live in my parents’ or grandparents’ time,” said Mrs. Peeples, a full-time homemaker.
sentences.sContent_eng: “I would not have wanted to live in my parents’ or grandparents’ time,” said Mrs. Peeples, a full-time homemaker.
sentences.sCn: 皮尔普斯太太现在是个全职主妇。 她说：“我不会继续活在我父母或祖父母那个时代了。

sentences.sContent: ...a homemaker had no legal claim on the earnings of her husband...

trans.tranOther: a woman who works at home cleaning and cooking etc and does not have another job
